I install it on tomcat 7 and rum it, version 0.8.0. on win xp 32bit.
In wa=
yback machine gui there is input url, starts with http://.
When i enter pat=
h to mine .arc file it displays that its not in archive.

I fix all the errors by move all=
 dependent heritrix jars from webapp lib into jdk/ext/lib because tomcat fi=
rst load jars from ext.
Now i got another problem, crawler start and finish=
es almost in the same time, crawl.log is not empty but crawl status is notC=
rawled.

Any ideas ?

Subject: Re: SV: [archive=
-crawler] Embed Heritrix 1.14.4.


Yes, Heritrix comes with its own (patche=
d) HTTPClient implementation.
Is there a way to override tomcats httpclient=
 in this case, or should i run heritrix on another server to avoid conflict=
?
When i put patched httpClient in tomcat common lib dir i get DNS error, w=
hen its in webapp lib dir i get nosuchmethoderror(setCookieMap).

_________=
_______________________
From: Bjarne Andersen <bja@...>
To:=
 "archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com" <archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: =
Monday, May 6, 2013 11:57 AM
Subject: SV: [archive-crawler] Embed Heritrix =
1.14.4.

Heritrix comes with its own (patched) HTTPClient implementation as=
 far as I remember. So running inside a tomcat you might have conflicting l=
ibs ?

best
Bjarne Andersen
Netarchive.dk
